title: 合并区间 (Merge Intervals)
content: 思路: // @Title: 合并区间 (Merge Intervals) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-05-21 13:45:00 // @Runtime: 8 ms // @Memory: 45.4 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { class Point { int start; int end; public Point(int start, int end) { this.start = start; this.end = end; } } public int[][] merge(int[][] intervals) { List<Point> pointList = new ArrayList<>(); for (int i = 0; i < intervals.length; i++) { int[] val = intervals[i]; pointList.add(new Point(val[0], val[1])); } pointList.sort((a, b) -> { int compare = Integer.compare(a.start, b.start); if (compare == 0) { compare = Integer.compare(a.end, b.end); } return compare; }); Point cur = pointList.get(0); List<Point> result = new ArrayList<>(); result.add(cur); for (int i = 1; i < pointList.size(); i++) { Point p = pointList.get(i); Point last = result.get(result.size() - 1); if (p.start <= last.end) { last.end = Math.max(p.end,last.end); } else { result.add(p); } } int[][] res = new int[result.size()][2]; for (int i = 0; i < result.size(); i++) { res[i] = new int[] { result.get(i).start, result.get(i).end }; } return res; } }
